title: Pony Express
comment: Could not open unless I opened a bunch of other stupid games

title: What Happened?
comment: This app used to work fine. It was recently updated to include some sort of bug/feature that prevents the program from playing when the screen goes to sleep. This was never a problem before. I had no problem deleting the Angels of Death (which I had no interest in), and the app is great other than the aforementioned new bug.

title: WTH is Linux Outlaws?
comment: Silly me, I thought *I* would get to choose the podcasts I listen to. Instead, this app insists on downloading and refreshing some podcast called Linux Outlaws. It won't let me unsubscribe/remove them, and it's so busy refreshing them that I can't even TRY to search for any other `casts. Waste of bandwidth -- uninstalling.

title: Best way to get the show.
comment: I am always on the run. This is my best way to get the show.
useless to me until I can add my own feeds
They left out the best feature, formatted show notes!
Great app, great show. Keep up the good work
Great start, works fine on my Samsung Galaxy Pro even if it has a QVGA landscape screen. Well done!
Great app for fans of the podcast or people interested in checking it out
Great podcast gets a suitably great app... Congrats!
